name: WebGLActiveInfo
description: The WebGLActiveInfo interface is part of the WebGL API and represents the information returned by calling the WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveAttrib() and WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveUniform() methods.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'WebGLActiveInfo' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
